stories.title: We Know What Facebook Knew, and When It Knew It. Now What?

stories.text: Just noticed when googling "reitschuster volksverpetzer", the former being a German political commentator on the right, the latter on the left, search results are dominated by the left-wing site even though the site is around 5 times smaller. Any ideas, perspectives, experiences, knowledge about it?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do Google search results have a political bias?

stories.text:
Does anybody know of an alternative to https://xlts.dev/team?

Background: we're in the middle of migrating a large SaaS app to React but won't finish in time (by far) until end of 2021. This is partly caused due to additional regulations we have to implement and partly due to starting way too late with the migration.

We're researching the options we have, so if any of you was/is in the same situation and could provide a few insights in what you did and how it turned out, we'd greatly appreciate that.
stories.title: Ask HN: AngularJS LTS Past 2021
